name: Virginia Bank and Trust Company
description: Virginia Bank and Trust Company (VABK) is a community-focused financial institution dedicated to providing a full range of banking services to individuals and businesses in Virginia. Established in 1979, VABK has built a reputation for personalized service and local decision-making, helping clients achieve their financial goals. The bank offers a variety of products including personal and business checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. VABK emphasizes community involvement and strives to foster relationships with local businesses and residents, contributing to the economic growth of the region. With a commitment to innovation, VABK provides modern digital banking solutions, ensuring customers have convenient access to their accounts through online and mobile banking platforms. The bank is also dedicated to financial literacy, offering resources and workshops to help customers make informed financial decisions. VABK’s mission is to enhance the quality of life in the communities it serves by delivering exceptional banking experiences and building lasting relationships.

seo.meta_title: Virginia Bank and Trust Company | Local Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Virginia Bank and Trust Company, your community-focused bank offering personalized banking services, loans, and investment solutions in Virginia.

faq.question: What services does Virginia Bank and Trust offer?
faq.answer: Virginia Bank and Trust offers personal and business banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is Virginia Bank and Trust headquartered?
faq.answer: Virginia Bank and Trust is headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: When was Virginia Bank and Trust founded?
faq.answer: Virginia Bank and Trust was founded in 1979.
